mapper.sql: t.ID, t.HOSPITALCODE, t.HOSPITALNAME, t.AREAID, t.ORGCODE, t.HOSPITALTYPE, t.HOSLEVEL, t.HOSORDER, t.HOSTUNIT, t.AFFILIATION, t.ECONOMICSTYPE, t.CREATIONTIME, t.HOSADDRESS, t.LEGALPERSON, t.CONTACTPERSON, t.CONTACTTEL, t.MOBILE, t.EMAIL, t.ADDTIME, t.ORGAREAID, t.HOSTYPE, t.BZCWS, t.SYCWS, t.WSJSRYS, t.ISHZYLDDYY, t.ISYBDDYY, t.ISLGBDDYY, t.ISDEMC, t.ISXSZSFZ, t.XSZSFZYCOUNT, t.QZSQWSFWZCOUNT, t.DJYUSERID, t.JYUSERID, t.FJYUSERID, t.ISUSING, t.ISCHECK, t.ISUSINGREASON, t.HOSPITALCATEGORY, t.ORGCODEVALUE, t.BASICDRUGSYSTEM, t.BASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID, t.UNBASICDRUGSYSTEM, t.UNBASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID, t.LOWDRUGSYSTEM, t.LOWDRUGSYSTEMUSERID, t.HOSPITALCLASS, t.CHECKSTATUS, t.CITYCHECKREASON, t.TOWNCHECKREASON, t.PHARMACYCOUNT, t.ISREMOTE, t.NSSBH
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_HOSPITAL( ID , HOSPITALCODE , HOSPITALNAME , AREAID , ORGCODE , HOSPITALTYPE , HOSLEVEL , HOSORDER , HOSTUNIT , AFFILIATION , ECONOMICSTYPE , CREATIONTIME , HOSADDRESS , LEGALPERSON , CONTACTPERSON , CONTACTTEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , ADDTIME , ORGAREAID , HOSTYPE , BZCWS , SYCWS , WSJSRYS , ISHZYLDDYY , ISYBDDYY , ISLGBDDYY , ISDEMC , ISXSZSFZ , XSZSFZYCOUNT , QZSQWSFWZCOUNT , DJYUSERID , JYUSERID , FJYUSERID , ISUSING , ISCHECK , ISUSINGREASON , HOSPITALCATEGORY , ORGCODEVALUE , BASICDRUGSYSTEM , BASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , UNBASICDRUGSYSTEM , UNBASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , LOWDRUGSYSTEM , LOWDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , HOSPITALCLASS , CHECKSTATUS , CITYCHECKREASON , TOWNCHECKREASON , PHARMACYCOUNT , ISREMOTE , NSSBH ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{hospitalcode} , #{hospitalname} , #{areaid} , #{orgcode} , #{hospitaltype} , #{hoslevel} , #{hosorder} , #{hostunit} , #{affiliation} , #{economicstype} , #{creationtime} , #{hosaddress} , #{legalperson} , #{contactperson} , #{contacttel} , #{mobile} , #{email} , #{addtime} , #{orgareaid} , #{hostype} , #{bzcws} , #{sycws} , #{wsjsrys} , #{ishzylddyy} , #{isybddyy} , #{islgbddyy} , #{isdemc} , #{isxszsfz} , #{xszsfzycount} , #{qzsqwsfwzcount} , #{djyuserid} , #{jyuserid} , #{fjyuserid} , #{isusing} , #{ischeck} , #{isusingreason} , #{hospitalcategory} , #{orgcodevalue} , #{basicdrugsystem} , #{basicdrugsystemuserid} , #{unbasicdrugsystem} , #{unbasicdrugsystemuserid} , #{lowdrugsystem} , #{lowdrugsystemuserid} , #{hospitalclass} , #{checkstatus} , #{citycheckreason} , #{towncheckreason} , #{pharmacycount} , #{isremote} , #{nssbh} )

INSERT INTO BASE_HOSPITAL ( ID , HOSPITALCODE , HOSPITALNAME , AREAID , ORGCODE , HOSPITALTYPE , HOSLEVEL , HOSORDER , HOSTUNIT , AFFILIATION , ECONOMICSTYPE , CREATIONTIME , HOSADDRESS , LEGALPERSON , CONTACTPERSON , CONTACTTEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , ADDTIME , ORGAREAID , HOSTYPE , BZCWS , SYCWS , WSJSRYS , ISHZYLDDYY , ISYBDDYY , ISLGBDDYY , ISDEMC , ISXSZSFZ , XSZSFZYCOUNT , QZSQWSFWZCOUNT , DJYUSERID , JYUSERID , FJYUSERID , ISUSING , ISCHECK , ISUSINGREASON , HOSPITALCATEGORY , ORGCODEVALUE , BASICDRUGSYSTEM , BASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , UNBASICDRUGSYSTEM , UNBASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , LOWDRUGSYSTEM , LOWDRUGSYSTEMUSERID , HOSPITALCLASS , CHECKSTATUS , CITYCHECKREASON , TOWNCHECKREASON , PHARMACYCOUNT , ISREMOTE , NSSBH ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospitalcode}, #{item.hospitalname}, #{item.areaid}, #{item.orgcode}, #{item.hospitaltype}, #{item.hoslevel}, #{item.hosorder}, #{item.hostunit}, #{item.affiliation}, #{item.economicstype}, #{item.creationtime}, #{item.hosaddress}, #{item.legalperson}, #{item.contactperson}, #{item.contacttel}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.email}, #{item.addtime}, #{item.orgareaid}, #{item.hostype}, #{item.bzcws}, #{item.sycws}, #{item.wsjsrys}, #{item.ishzylddyy}, #{item.isybddyy}, #{item.islgbddyy}, #{item.isdemc}, #{item.isxszsfz}, #{item.xszsfzycount}, #{item.qzsqwsfwzcount}, #{item.djyuserid}, #{item.jyuserid}, #{item.fjyuserid}, #{item.isusing}, #{item.ischeck}, #{item.isusingreason}, #{item.hospitalcategory}, #{item.orgcodevalue}, #{item.basicdrugsystem}, #{item.basicdrugsystemuserid}, #{item.unbasicdrugsystem}, #{item.unbasicdrugsystemuserid}, #{item.lowdrugsystem}, #{item.lowdrugsystemuserid}, #{item.hospitalclass}, #{item.checkstatus}, #{item.citycheckreason}, #{item.towncheckreason}, #{item.pharmacycount}, #{item.isremote}, #{item.nssbh} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BASE_HOSPITAL
HOSPITALCODE = #{hospitalcode},
HOSPITALNAME = #{hospitalname},
AREAID = #{areaid},
ORGCODE = #{orgcode},
HOSPITALTYPE = #{hospitaltype},
HOSLEVEL = #{hoslevel},
HOSORDER = #{hosorder},
HOSTUNIT = #{hostunit},
AFFILIATION = #{affiliation},
ECONOMICSTYPE = #{economicstype},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime},
HOSADDRESS = #{hosaddress},
LEGALPERSON = #{legalperson},
CONTACTPERSON = #{contactperson},
CONTACTTEL = #{contacttel},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
EMAIL = #{email},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
ORGAREAID = #{orgareaid},
HOSTYPE = #{hostype},
BZCWS = #{bzcws},
SYCWS = #{sycws},
WSJSRYS = #{wsjsrys},
ISHZYLDDYY = #{ishzylddyy},
ISYBDDYY = #{isybddyy},
ISLGBDDYY = #{islgbddyy},
ISDEMC = #{isdemc},
ISXSZSFZ = #{isxszsfz},
XSZSFZYCOUNT = #{xszsfzycount},
QZSQWSFWZCOUNT = #{qzsqwsfwzcount},
DJYUSERID = #{djyuserid},
JYUSERID = #{jyuserid},
FJYUSERID = #{fjyuserid},
ISUSING = #{isusing},
ISCHECK = #{ischeck},
ISUSINGREASON = #{isusingreason},
HOSPITALCATEGORY = #{hospitalcategory},
ORGCODEVALUE = #{orgcodevalue},
BASICDRUGSYSTEM = #{basicdrugsystem},
BASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID = #{basicdrugsystemuserid},
UNBASICDRUGSYSTEM = #{unbasicdrugsystem},
UNBASICDRUGSYSTEMUSERID = #{unbasicdrugsystemuserid},
LOWDRUGSYSTEM = #{lowdrugsystem},
LOWDRUGSYSTEMUSERID = #{lowdrugsystemuserid},
HOSPITALCLASS = #{hospitalclass},
CHECKSTATUS = #{checkstatus},
CITYCHECKREASON = #{citycheckreason},
TOWNCHECKREASON = #{towncheckreason},
PHARMACYCOUNT = #{pharmacycount},
ISREMOTE = #{isremote},
NSSBH = #{nssbh},
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.ID, t.HOSPITALCODE, t.HOSPITALNAME, t.AREAID, t.ISUSING, t.ADDTIME, d.DICVALUE HOSPITALTYPE, C.LASTUPDATETIME, a.AREANAME FROM TRADE_HOS T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT L.DATAID,MAX(L.CHANGETIME) LASTUPDATETIME FROM SYS_CGCHANGELOG L WHERE L.CHANGETYPE='BASE_HOSPITAL' GROUP BY L.DATAID) C ON T.ID=C.DATAID LEFT JOIN DIC_HOSPITAL_ALLCLASS d on t.HOSPITALCATEGORY=d.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA a on t.AREAID=a.AREAID
AND t.HOSPITALCODE in(
#{item} )
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY C.LASTUPDATETIME ASC, T.HOSPITALCODE
